insight: ChatControl's Discord integration requires the DiscordSRV plugin. Users must disable DiscordSRV's built-in chat relay by setting `DiscordChatChannelMinecraftToDiscord: false` in DiscordSRV's `config.yml`, otherwise messages get duplicated. ChatControl checks this on startup and logs a warning if it's still enabled (see ChatControl.java line ~247).

When the last player quits, `then discord`, `then console`, `then log`, and `then write` operators in quit messages are silently skipped because PlayerMessage.filter() iterates over online players to execute operators — and that list is empty after the last player leaves. A fix was proposed in PR #3462 to add a fallback that executes sender-only operators (discord, console, log, notify, write) when no receivers were processed.
